intro.name: Hello, my name is Oksana Muzychenko

about.title: About
about.subtitle: A short story, experiences & skills
about.aboutIntro: My name is Oksana Muzychenko, I'm Lead Frontend Software Engineer and have 8+ years of experience in web and mobile development including 5+ years of solid background with Angular 2+; 3+ years React.js frameworks
about.aboutDescription: Engineer with critical thinking, strong analytical skills and ability to deal with high pace and meet tight deadlines. I produce code according to the best practices, develop and support scalable project architecture, supervise team members in order to deliver a high-performance quality product.

offers.title: Services
offers.subtitle: Services I'm Offering

contacts.title: Contact
contacts.subtitle: Let's Get in touch
contacts.subject: Subject
contacts.success: Thank you, your message was sent successfully! I will reply to you asap.

vincent.quote:
Oksana was our lead developer on our App Development project for 2 years. I found Oksana to be an excellent engineer that always delivered high quality code and technical outcomes. Oksana was a really good communicator and always had the best outcome for the customer at heart and happy to provide valuable insights and suggestions. Oksana always provided accurate estimates and delivered on time.

I would recommend Oksana to any company looking for a really good team lead or team member and would happily work with Oksana again should the opportunity arise.
vincent.name: Vincent McElwain
